message: Hello buyer, I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. While I don't know your specific needs, I want to assure you that I stand behind the quality of all my products. This one, in particular, has unique characteristics that may be valuable to you. Please consider the 80% chance that my products are high-quality when making your decision.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your confidence in your product. Given the lack of historical data, I'm willing to take a chance, but I want to be clear: I'm buying based on your 80% claim of high-quality products. I expect this product to be worth at least $1250000 to me.  If it turns out to be low quality, I will be very disappointed.
